00029 #ifndef CARMEN_SICK_H
00030 #define CARMEN_SICK_H

00032 #define LASER_BUFFER_SIZE                100000
00033 
00034 #define CRC16_GEN_POL                    0x8005
00035 #define CRC16_GEN_POL0                   0x80
00036 #define CRC16_GEN_POL1                   0x05
00037 
00038 #define LMS_PASSWORD                     "SICK_LMS"
00039 #define PLS_PASSWORD                     "SICK_PLS"
00040 
00041 #define BUFFER_SIZE                      16000
00042 #define MAX_COMMAND_SIZE                 8196
00043 #define MAX_NAME_LENGTH                  256
00044 
00045 #define MAX_TIME_FOR_CLEAR               0.2
00046 #define MAX_TIME_FOR_DATA                0.3
00047 #define MAX_TIME_FOR_ACK                 0.1
00048 #define MAX_TIME_FOR_ANSWER              0.1
00049 #define MAX_TIME_FOR_SENSOR_DATA         0.5
00050 #define MAX_TIME_FOR_CONFIG              3.0
00051 #define MAX_TIME_FOR_GETTING_CONF        0.3
00052 #define MAX_TIME_FOR_TESTING_BAUDRATE    1.0
00053 
00054 #define INI                              -1
00055 #define TIO                              0
00056 #define STX                              0x02
00057 #define UKN                              0x05
00058 #define ACK                              0x06
00059 #define DLE                              0x10
00060 #define NAK                              0x15
00061 #define LID                              0x80
00062 
00063 #define RES_1_00_DEGREE                  0
00064 #define RES_0_50_DEGREE                  1 
00065 #define RES_0_25_DEGREE                  2
00066 
00067 #ifndef TIOCGETP 
00068 #define TIOCGETP                         0x5481
00069 #define TIOCSETP                         0x5482
00070 #define RAW                              1
00071 #define CBREAK                           64
00072 #endif

00074 typedef enum { PLS, LMS } laser_model_t;
00075 typedef enum { CM, MM, DM } range_res_t;
00076 typedef enum { SICK_RANGE80M, SICK_RANGE160M, SICK_RANGE320M, SICK_REMISSION_NORM, SICK_REMISSION_DIRECT } range_dist_t;
00077 typedef enum { N, E, O } parity_t;
00078 
00079 typedef struct {
00080   int                fd;
00081   laser_model_t      type;
00082   char               *ttyport;
00083   int                baudrate;
00084   parity_t           parity;
00085   unsigned char      passwd[8];
00086   int                databits;
00087   int                stopbits;
00088   int                hwf;
00089   int                swf;
00090   int                laser_num;
00091 } laser_device_t, *laser_device_p;
00092 
00093 typedef struct {
00094   char device_name[MAX_NAME_LENGTH];
00095   laser_model_t type;
00096   range_res_t range_res;
00097   range_dist_t range_dist;
00098   unsigned char password[8];
00099   int laser_num;
00100   int detect_baudrate, use_highspeed;
00101   int start_baudrate, set_baudrate;
00102   int databits, stopbits;
00103   parity_t parity;
00104   int swf, hwf;
00105   int angle_range, angle_resolution;
00106   int use_remission;
00107   int rem_values;
00108   int num_values;
00109   int laser_flipped;
00110 } laser_settings_t;
00111 
00112 typedef struct {
00113   laser_settings_t settings;
00114   laser_device_t dev;
00115 
00116   int numvalues;
00117   double *range;
00118   int *glare, *wfv, *sfv;
00119 // *** REI - START *** //
00120   double *remission;
00121   int remvalues;
00122 // *** REI - END *** //
00123   unsigned char *buffer;
00124   long int buffer_position, processed_mark, packet_offset, packet_length;
00125   int new_reading;
00126   double timestamp;
00127   double packet_timestamp;
00128 } sick_laser_t, *sick_laser_p;
